title: Stricter punishments for trolls.
body:
Can we just get a Permanent IP/Hardware Ban for trolls?
Really sick of players ruining this game by acting like idiots and doing whatever they want instead of actually playing the game, Last game i had a Zed and Yi just fighting each other in Middle river all game, taking turns in killing each other.

Seriously what is wrong, Just perm ban them, they ruin this community.

We don't want them here, You don't want them ruining your profits by forcing players to quit.

BE STRICT.
It's the only way to stop them.
